Los Angeles Solar Permits

See recent LADBS solar-related filings; filter, download CSV, create alerts.

Live from LADBS CSV & Alerts LA Coverage

Find solar jobs fast: Track photovoltaic (PV) and energy storage (ESS) filings across LA. Perfect for installers, EPCs, financiers and O&M teams.

Pro tip: Sort the CSV by valuation and description to spot larger systems and ESS add-ons. Use contractor or neighborhood keywords to segment your pipeline.

Useful filters

  • PV size cues: “kW”, “DC”, “DC coupled”, “inverter”
  • ESS terms: “battery”, “ESS”, “Powerwall”, “Enphase”, “backup”
  • Segments: “commercial”, “warehouse”, “multifamily”, “ADU”

FAQ

How fresh is the data?

We pull from official LADBS sources and refresh continuously. Each record includes its latest update time.

Can I filter by contractor or neighborhood?

Yes—use keyword filters in the CSV or include the area/contractor name when creating an alert.

Do you support CSV exports and email alerts?

Yes—download CSVs for analysis and create alerts to get new matches by email.
